info.title: Annature
info.description: Annature is the leading Australian-owned eSigning solution with an integrated digital signature provider. This connector helps businesses to create envelopes and integrate annature document signing workflow using Annature API (v1).

get.description: List All Documents for a envelope

post.description: Triggers when an event occurs when envelopes completed or recipient views

url.description: The HTTPS URL for the webhook endpoint
url.title: url

type.description: The recipient type, defaults to signer when not supplied

muted.description: This will stop Annature from sending any correspondence to the recipient

session_completed.x-ms-summary: Destination endpoint after the recipient has completed the envelope
session_completed.description: Destination endpoint after the recipient has completed the envelope

session_declined.x-ms-summary: Destination endpoint after the recipient has declined to sign the envelope
session_declined.description: Destination endpoint after the recipient has declined to sign the envelope

get.description: Get a single recipient created for an envelope using the id property that was returned in the create an envelope response body

EndpointDurationFromQuery.name: endpoint_duration
EndpointDurationFromQuery.description: Sets the number of minutes that the original, and master endpoints will be accessible for. Number can range between 1 and 10080 with the default being 60

EnvelopeNameFromQuery.name: name
EnvelopeNameFromQuery.description: An exact-match filter on the list based on the envelope's name property

EnvelopeStatusFromQuery.name: status
EnvelopeStatusFromQuery.description: An exact-match filter on the list based on the envelope's status

EnvelopeRecipientFromQuery.name: recipient
EnvelopeRecipientFromQuery.description: An exact-match filter on the list based on any recipient's name or email property

CreatedBeforeFromQuery.name: created_before
CreatedBeforeFromQuery.description: Returns results where the created date is before the given value

CreatedAfterFromQuery.name: created_after
CreatedAfterFromQuery.description: Returns results where the created date is after the given value

CompletedBeforeFromQuery.name: completed_before
CompletedBeforeFromQuery.description: Returns results where the completed date is before the given value

CompletedAfterFromQuery.name: completed_after
CompletedAfterFromQuery.description: Returns results where the completed date is after the given value
